# reloadData()

**Instance Method**

Reloads the data from the data source.

## Declaration

```swift
func reloadData()
```

## Discussion

Call this method when the data source changed, which notifies the content manager to reload the data from the data source.

## Updating data

- **beginUpdates()**: Updates several Media Player content items at once.
- **endUpdates()**: Ends a synchronized update.

items.description: Updates several Media Player content items at once.
